sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Earlier Moscow officials had reported shooting down 32 Ukrainian drones over the country's Moscow, Bryansk, Orel and Kursk regions. They also reported that cross-border shelling had killed two other people in Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Saturday attacks took place the day after an 18-hour aerial Russian barrage across Ukraine which killed at least 39 civilians. On Friday, Moscow's forces launched 122 missiles and dozens of drones across Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: An onslaught described by one Air Force official as the biggest aerial barrage of the war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Israel released footage on Friday claiming it had located and destroyed what it said were Hamas tunnels in northern Gaza, including hideout apartments of the militant group's leader Yahya Sinwar.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In the meantime, UN officials have warned of the risk of regional spillover.

sentences.sentence: The continued daily exchange of fire across the Blue Line posed grave risk to regional stability.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: There have been several instances of strikes deeper into the territories of Lebanon and Israel, raising the specter of an uncontained conflict with potentially devastating consequences for the people of both countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Drone footage shows thousands of tents set up by displaced families who fled to Rafah for safety.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: On Friday, relatives mourned loved ones killed in an overnight bombardment at the Al-Aqsa Martyrs' Hospital in Gaza's central city of Deir el-Bala, receiving the bodies of 40 people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Serbian officials have decided to hold a partial rerun of the election following protests over alleged fraud.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The rerun affects only a small portion of the Serbian electorate, with voters returning to cast ballots at 30 polling stations out of more than 8,000.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The movement Serbia Against Violence has called for a boycott of the rerun.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The movement Serbia Against Violence has called for a boycott of the rerun. Students started a 24-hour blockade outside government buildings in Belgrade on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Thousands took to the street in Belgrade on Saturday accusing the populist authorities of Serbian President Aleksandar Vukic of orchestrating a fraud during the recent general election.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The protest capped nearly two weeks of rallies against reported widespread irregularities during the December 17th ballot.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: At least 14 Eurostar services have been cancelled on Saturday from London St Pancras due to flooding in a nearby tunnel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Passengers were left stranded on the Eurostar concourse in Paris as services between London and Eddsfield were flooded.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Only one train will be running in both directions on one of the busiest weekends of the year.

sentences.sentence: In northern and central parts of Germany, floods have prompted evacuations of dozens of hundreds of people. In Meppen, where the River H- und der Ems-River sich treffen, treffen sich die Anwohner, die Tag und Nacht arbeiten, Wasser zu pumpen und die Heise- und die Heise- und die Heise-Berge zu beherrschen.
